discovered_companies.background:
Zama is an open source cryptography company building state-of-the-art Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) solutions for blockchain and AI. The company is remote-friendly with headquarters in Paris and focuses on solving privacy and security challenges by making homomorphic encryption mainstream.
Zama is a company focused on privacy-preserving technologies, particularly using Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) to enhance confidentiality in machine learning applications, decentralized applications, and various blockchain solutions.
Zama is an open source cryptography company building state-of-the-art Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) solutions for blockchain and AI. They offer a robust suite of open source FHE libraries and solutions, enabling developers to build applications with end-to-end encryption without needing deep cryptographic knowledge.

founders.name: Dr Rand Hindi
founders.background: Rand is an entrepreneur and deeptech investor. He started coding at the age of 10, founded a Social Network at 14, and started a PhD at 21. He created Snips, a privacy-centric AI startup acquired by Sonos. Rand holds a BSc in Computer Science and a PhD in bioinformatics from UCL.

founders.name: Rand Hindi
founders.background: Rand Hindi is the Co-Founder and CEO of Zama. He is involved in building FHE solutions for blockchain and AI.

discovered_companies.overall_summary:
Zama is focused on privacy-preserving technologies using Fully Homomorphic Encryption. The company is led by experienced professionals in cryptography and aims to make privacy a non-issue by encrypting data end-to-end. They are involved in open source communities and backed by investors supporting deeptech companies.
Zama is dedicated to advancing privacy-preserving technologies through the use of Fully Homomorphic Encryption. They offer a range of products and services aimed at enhancing confidentiality in various applications, including machine learning and blockchain. The company collaborates with partners to integrate FHE into projects, ensuring privacy and compliance.
Zama is focused on providing privacy-preserving solutions using Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) for blockchain and AI applications. They offer products like fhEVM for building decentralized applications with privacy on Ethereum, and solutions for confidential stablecoins, decentralized identity, and more. Zama emphasizes the importance of privacy in the digital age and is actively engaged in developing technologies to support this.

discovered_companies.background:
Ellipsis Labs builds applications and infrastructure to create a sustainable foundation for finance. They focus on modern crypto finance, developing products like Phoenix, a fully on-chain limit orderbook decentralized exchange on Solana, and Atlas, a Layer 2 blockchain for high-performance DeFi applications.
Our mission is to build a better financial system. We take pride in our strong company culture and mission-driven team.
Crypto paved the way for new financial systems, and Ellipsis Labs is on a mission to improve the landscape for high-performance applications and advanced use cases. We're upgrading the century-old financial system by replacing the foundation and applications on top. With security, scalability, and speed, we're creating a modern world where finance can exist without boundaries.

funding.description: Ellipsis Labs has raised from top venture funds to build out one of the strongest engineering teams in crypto.

discovered_companies.overall_summary:
Ellipsis Labs is a company focused on building modern crypto finance solutions, with products like Phoenix and Atlas. They have raised $21M in funding led by Haun Ventures.
Ellipsis Labs is focused on creating a better financial system with a strong company culture and mission-driven team.
Ellipsis Labs is focused on enhancing the financial system through high-performance applications in the crypto space, emphasizing security, scalability, and speed. The company is backed by top venture funds.

discovered_companies.background: Hyperbolic is an initiative driven by the belief that AI should be an openly shared asset. The company is building an open-access platform for AI development by aggregating idle computing resources and making it simple to use them. This approach allows individuals and organizations to use collective computing capacity for AI model training and hosting models on their platform, thus enabling open access to AI.

founders.name: Dr. Jasper (Yue) Zhang
founders.background: Co-Founder & CEO. Completed Math Ph.D. at UC Berkeley in 2 years. Gold Medalist at Alibaba Global Math Competition and Chinese Mathematical Olympiad. Previously at Ava Labs and Citadel Securities.

founders.name: Dr. Yuchen Jin
founders.background: Co-Founder & CTO. Led Relax, an innovative open-source AI compiler within Apache TVM. Holds a Ph.D. in CS Systems and Networking, from the University of Washington, with publications at top conferences including ICLR, SIGCOMM, NSDI, and SOSP.

discovered_companies.overall_summary: Hyperbolic aims to democratize access to AI by providing an open-access platform that aggregates idle computing resources. The company is backed by leading investors and is led by a team of experienced professionals in AI and technology.

discovered_companies.background:
Privy is a powerful authentication and key management platform designed to securely onboard, activate, and manage users at scale. It offers flexible wallet infrastructure and tools to securely onboard, manage, and grow user bases. The platform supports authentication and onboarding through various methods including email, SMS, social providers, and external wallets. It is built to work across multiple blockchain networks and provides enterprise-grade security.
Privy provides seamless UX for the whole user journey, offering features that work together through out-of-the-box components or bare-metal SDKs to help craft products. It is built for flexibility, allowing customization of components or direct use of hyper-flexible APIs for a full whitelabel experience. Privy supports web and mobile optimization with available SDKs.
Privy is focused on changing the way users connect to their favorite products by empowering users to maintain control over their data and assets online. The company emphasizes better developer tooling and is grounded in impact, focusing on product engineering to move the space forward.
Our mission is to make privacy and user ownership the default online. We build simple, flexible developer tooling that make it easy to build products that put users first. By leveraging modern cryptography, we shift the status quo around digital ownership and protect the accounts and assets of millions of users.

security_assessment.security_risks: Privy emphasizes the security of user data and assets as a top priority. The platform has undergone several audits including cryptography audits by Cure 53 and Zellic, a pentest by SwordBytes, and an infrastructure audit by Doyensec. It has also achieved SOC 2 Type I attestation and is in progress for SOC 2 Type II.

discovered_companies.overall_summary:
Privy is a comprehensive platform for authentication and key management, focusing on secure user onboarding and management across blockchain networks. It offers robust security measures and has been audited by several security firms. The platform is trusted by industry leaders and supports a wide range of authentication methods.
Privy offers a comprehensive suite of tools for user management, authentication, and wallet infrastructure, designed to enhance user experience in web3 products. It supports various SDKs and provides robust wallet connectors, making it easy for users to sign in with existing wallets. Privy also focuses on user management, offering insights and analytics to help understand user engagement.
Privy is a company that aims to reshape user experiences and data infrastructure on the web by providing tools that allow users to maintain control over their data. The company is remote-friendly with a core hub in New York City and values diverse perspectives and impact-driven engineering.
Privy is focused on building developer tools that prioritize user privacy and ownership using modern cryptography. The company is looking for talented individuals to join their team and contribute to their mission.

The company emphasizes a culture of innovation, inclusivity, and growth, with a remote-first work environment and various employee benefits.
QuickNode is focused on providing scalable blockchain infrastructure solutions. They emphasize privacy, trustlessness, and censorship resistance. The company is led by experienced founders and a diverse team, aiming to simplify blockchain application development and scaling.
QuickNode is a blockchain infrastructure provider that offers a range of services including APIs, real-time data streams, and managed blockchain solutions. The company emphasizes performance, reliability, and security, supporting over 60 blockchain networks. It is trusted by leading businesses and web3 projects for its robust infrastructure and technical support.
